segments.text: We need someone rather quickly , the sooner the better .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can I ask what the position pays ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , of course depends somewhat on experience , background and that sort of thing . What are your currently earning ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My current salary is in the range of fifty thousand yuan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but not including overtime pay . I'm looking for a salary slightly higher than my present one , with opportunities for raises if I work well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What starting salary would you expect here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have to support my parents who are advanced in age , so I'd like to commence at HAD 2,500 a month .
segments.speaker: S2
